properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 11:43AM CST until February 5 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman OK
properties.description:
...A WINTER STORM IS EXPECTED TO BRING SNOW AND SLEET TO THE
SOUTHERN PLAINS TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY...

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth
of an inch.

* WHERE...Atoka and Bryan Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7 for road information.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY
